name: The Voodoo You Do 2
description: The casket opens and the pitch blackness is replaced with the sight of the moon; full in the night sky. Then, someone leans over, facing you and smiling a lunatic grin. He wears a dirty black top hat and dark glasses with one missing lens, revealing a milky eyeball. He has cotton plugs in his nose like a corpse. You smell cigar smoke and rum on him and his breath.
